short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly check which of your favorite Twitch streamers are live right from your favorite browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Quickly and easily check which of your favorite channels are live on Twitch right now, straight from your favorite browser.

Now Live has an easy, intuitive, and modern UI, that gets you closer to your favorite streamers. Go straight from just browsing the web to your favorite streamer in seconds.

Don't like something? Let me know with the Support URL and I will get to it right away.

Now Live is designed for ease of use as well as keeping up with the modern design of the web by using modern frameworks like Preact and Sass to bring you nothing but the best experience with Twitch.

Never miss your favorite streamer going live again, and stay on top of Twitch with ease!
